comments.body:
This change fixes a golint failure and this PR needs to contain removal of the line of `staging/src/k8s.io/kube-proxy/config/v1alpha1` from hack/.golint_failures file as pull-kubernetes-verify detail.
```
Some packages in hack/.golint_failures are passing golint. Please remove them.

  staging/src/k8s.io/kube-proxy/config/v1alpha1
```
The `LocalModeClusterCIDR` value is not defined here, does it need to be?
Or are we better putting a literal value here?
I was going by the prior art for ProxyMode where the type is defined, but not the values. Do we need to define the values here?
I don't know any more - all the config stuff has changed since I knew it well ;)  Folow convention, I guess.
